body.header: IELTS Writing Task 1You should spend about 20 minutes on this task. You should write at least 150 words.

p.b: You have seen an advertisement in your local newspaper for a hotel receptionist.
Write a letter of application to the hotel manager. Write about your experience and qualifications and say why you would like the job. Also state when you would be available for an interview.

div.p: You do NOT need to write your own address.
